title: How to Connect Your Blackberry to Your PC

steps.title: If either device is powered off, you'll want to turn it on now.
steps.content: If either device is powered off, you'll want to turn it on now.

steps.title: If you don't have the cable that came with your Blackberry, any USB cable will do.
steps.content: If you don't have the cable that came with your Blackberry, any USB cable will do. Plug the smaller side of your USB cable into the small USB port on the side of the Blackberry itself. Then plug the other side of the cable into the USB port of your PC.

steps.title: Wait for the device to install automatically.
steps.content: Wait for the device to install automatically. When you connect your Blackberry, it will automatically install itself on your computer. Wait for this process to finish.

steps.title: When your Blackberry is installed, a small pop-up will appear on your task bar.
steps.content: When your Blackberry is installed, a small pop-up will appear on your task bar. You are now ready to go!
